This video features Kathryn Sutherland (Professor of Bibliography and Textual Criticism at the University of Oxford) talking about Jane Austenâ€™s fiction manuscripts. This project brought together, in digital form, a manuscript collection originally scattered around the world, including transcripts, information about each manuscript, and a search facility.
